name: mailchecker
description: Cross-language temporary (disposable/throwaway) email detection library. Covers hundreds fake email providers.

scripts.changelog-git: npm run changelog && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m 'docs(changelog): updated' && git push origin master
scripts.release-after-pr: git pull --rebase && npm run build && npm run test && git commit -a -m 'feat(build): update plateform files' && npm run release-patch
scripts.release-patch: npm-release patch && npm run changelog-git && npm run publish-gem
scripts.publish-gem: sed -E -i '' "s/spec.version[[:space:]]*=(.*)/spec.version='${npm_package_version}'/g" *.gemspec && (git add *.gemspec && git commit -m "feat(gemspec): updated to ${npm_package_version}" || true) && gem build *.gemspec && gem push ruby-mailchecker-${npm_package_version}.gem

author: Francois-Guillaume Ribreau <npm@fgribreau.com> (http://fgribreau.com)
